Text.Page:
We've established a bounty on arkais. Something about their feathers, I believe.

Kill all the {@LinkCreature:30#220#teal} and {@LinkCreature:30#210#crimson arkais} you can find in {@Rgn:30001$$Balder's Refuge}.

Aneilon is administering the bounty payments.

Dead arkais means feathers for Allemantheia.

Great job!
Listen for the squawks. That's how you know arkais are near.
